title: Ornn Is Still 7800 IP
body:
He has been out a week, should he not be 6300 by now?

I mean I can't afford him either way, just an observation I made.

UPDATE : Price has now dropped, thank you.

replies.body: C'moon i don't want to spend 7800 Ip !
Just buy 3 Hextech mystery champion shards and reroll them.
Hmmmm y'know I just noticed that myself. I'll pass this along, but we'll most likely see that price drop in a day or so.
Come on, hurry up! We've been waiting since yesterday stop delaying the reduction you greeders! {{item:3301}}
